Storage / GetAll (publish and subscribe)

  • ../1-Set
  • ../2-Get/
  • ../3-GetAll/
  • ../4-Remove/
With Storage you can persist information in the server for the current connection. The information will live until you remove it or the server shuts down.

PreConditions

  1. A connection has been made and bound to the variable "ws". Connection Example
  2. The storage has a stored value with the key 'foo'. Storage Set Example

Code - Storage - GetAll

  1. Subscribe to the predefined serverside event (XSockets.Events.storage.getall). 
    ws.bind(XSockets.Events.storage.getAll, function(data){
    //handle array of data here...
});
  2. Publish to the predefined serverside event (XSockets.Events.storage.getall). 
    ws.trigger(XSockets.Events.storage.getAll, {});
